mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_no AS employeeNo, e.employee_id AS employeeId, e.branch_no AS branchNo, b.branch_name AS branchName, d.employee_name AS employeeName FROM employee e INNER JOIN branch b ON e.branch_no = b.branch_no INNER JOIN employee_detail d ON e.employee_no = d.employee_no WHERE e.employee_id LIKE 'T%' AND b.branch_no = #{branchNo} LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
